title: Just a Kiss
description: It all started with just a kiss.The first was ten years ago in high school.Our second was in a bar on the dance floor. We agreed to keep things casual.But we were like a fire burning behind closed doors. Those sparks had me wanting more. When I took a shot in the dark and asked for more, it brought us to the ultimate crossroads.Do we do things right, with just a kiss goodbye?Or do we do things right, with a kiss goodnight?
author: Samantha Lind
